author: Pete Williams
title: Supreme Court cancels oral arguments for rest of the term
description: Nine cases were to be argued during the two-week session beginning April 20, including a challenge to the current system used for electing the president.
content:
WASHINGTON The U.S. Supreme Court Friday said it will scrap the oral argument schedule for the rest of the term amid the coronavirus pandemic but left open the possibility that it might hear a few cases before the term ends in late June.
Nine cases were to b… [+1685 chars]
